name: Customer's Voice
text:
The Crowne snack set and a beer,
and... Ah!
Two Mighty Paw Buns, please!

name: Customer's Voice
text:
Excuse me!
Over here, Akashi Takoyaki, a Cola,
and a Sui Special Parfait!

name: Akashi
text:
Y-Yes!
Thank you for your order!
Please wait a moment!

name: Customer's Voice
text:
A large Justy Curry,
make it 'Numbing Justice' spicy!

name: Child's Voice
text:
Dad, I've decided too!
Um, a Hopper the Waffle, please!
And, orange juice!

name: Mokdai
text:
Whoa!
We just opened,
but it's already a huge success!

name: Sui
text:
More people come every year so I prepared myself,
but this is more than I expected...
But—

name: Melide
text:
Sui-chan, is this alright
for the parfait's presentation?
I'm quite confident in it.

name: Sui
text:
It's perfect, Melide-chan.
The orders are pouring in,
so please keep it up.

name: Melide
text:
Yes, leave it to me.
...Fufu. Running a shop like this
is really fun...

name: Mokdai
text:
Mhm!
It's tough with so many customers,
but thanks to everyone, it looks like we'll manage this year!

name: Yoshiori
text:
Stop yer yapping and move yer hands!
Be aware that you're keepin' customers waitin'!
—Here, take these two packs of takoyaki!

name: Monomasa
text:
Can we not afford to enjoy ourselves a little?
...Sui, is this cutting style
alright for the parfait fruit?

name: Sui
text:
It's fine... or rather.
This rabbit and bear, they're so cute!
I didn't know you had such skill, Monomasa-san...

name: Yoshiori
text:
Yer enjoyin' this quite a bit, aren'tcha!?
Gettin' all excited, that sure ain't like ya...
Don't go standin' out now.

name: Exio
text:
Fufu, it's not just Monomasa-kun,
don't you think it's fine to enjoy it a little?
—We'll need to place another order for fruit.

name: Yoshiori
text:
Aren't you the one enjoyin' this
the most, Exio-san...!?
At least take over the back kitchen duties.

name: Exio
text:
Oh, but who will manage the books then?
Besides... I prefer to be on the side
watching people work up a sweat.

name: Children
text:
It's Justice!
He's huge!!

name: Fan's Voice
text:
Justice-sa—n!
Give me a Justice Hug!!

name: Fan's Voice
text:
Hopper-san, please shake my hand!
Your last battle was so cool!!

name: Fan's Voice
text:
Whoa, it's really them!
Please let us take a picture with you!

name: Ryekie
text:
WAHAHAHA!!
Leave it to me!!!
Now, it's time for a Justice Hug!!!!

name: Huckle
text:
Photos are fine too.
If you'd like, your companion can join as well.

name: Ryekie
text:
Crowne!!
Take the picture!!!

name: Crowne
text:
Aye, aye. C'mon, c'mon,
get closer, closer!
—Alright, OK, let's have you a photo.

Orient City's summer celebration,
the Hero City Summer Festa.
The first day got off to a grand start.

Parallel Flight Inc.'s beach cafe,
located in a corner of the food stall area,
had a constant stream of customers the moment it opened.

With the cooperation of all members,
they managed both the cafe's operation and fan interactions,
safely reaching the end of the business day.

name: Akashi
text:
Kuhhaaa—!!
We're so busy again this year.
Ugh, my clothes are soaked in sweat.

name: Mokdai
text:
Good work. Here's your staff meal.
It's tough working amidst all these good smells.
I was trying so hard to ignore my rumbling stomach.

name: Sui
text:
It's busy, but it's really rewarding.
Fufu, I was so happy when a fan
came wearing an outfit that looked like my suit.

options.text: Here's a towel. Hold still while I wipe you?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Akashi
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Oh, thanks, [Player].
I'm soaked all over, see?
This shirt looks like I could wring out... Wait.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Akashi
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I-I'll wipe myself!!
Hey, look the other way!!

options.text: I'm too tired to move, so feed me something!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Mokdai
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You were talking just fine until a second ago!?
—Honestly, you can't be helped.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Mokdai
dialogue_after_selection.text:
It's a Mokdai special Mighty Paw Bun.
Hold still, [Player].
Here, say 'ah'.

options.text: Nice! Did you get a picture?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sui
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Of course we do, we took a two-shot.
Look, she said she sewed all the pleats on this skirt by hand.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sui
dialogue_after_selection.text:
[Player]-san, if this person comes again, could I ask you to transform me?
Fufu, I want to take a picture with her in my hero suit too.

name: Huckle
text:
Good work, everyone.
Yoshiori-kun and the others have already left.
You all can clock out when you're ready.

name: Huckle
text:
I hear we have more visitors this year than ever before.
Thank you for working so hard during this busy time.

name: Crowne
text:
There have been a lot of Kaibutsu incidents lately,
so many events were cancelled.
This is probably the rebound from that, right?

name: Ryekie
text:
HAHA!!
And that commotion was also safely resolved
thanks to the efforts of [Player] and the others!!!

name: Ryekie
text:
Now everyone is enjoying the Summer Festa
with smiles overflowing!!!!

name: Ryekie
text:
As a hero, there is nothing
that could make me happier!!!

name: Huckle
text:
To be honest, I wasn't even sure if I'd make it...
But as Ryekie says,
let's enjoy the Summer Festa for now.

name: Mokdai
text:
This year, there's also a new event
to go along with the Summer Festa!

name: Sui
text:
Ah, I've been seeing that on the news a lot lately.
I'm a little interested in it too.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Akashi
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You, that's definitely the face of someone who doesn't know.
I don't know much about it either, so let's listen carefully together.

name: Akashi
text:
I think it was something about a big event
on the moon after the Summer Festa ends, right?

name: Mokdai
text:
That's right!
The public hero license exam that was held at the
Archimedes Colony on the moon before—

name: Mokdai
text:
It's being held at that site for one week!
On the internet, they're calling it the After Summer Festa,
and it seems to be a huge sensation!

name: Mokdai
text:
I took some paid leave after the Summer Festa,
so I'm planning to go check it out.
I'm so excited...!

note: go check out The Glorious Rising Moon

dialogue_after_selection.name: Akashi
dialogue_after_selection.text:
That time was really crazy.
You suddenly got warped away...

options.text: I wonder if we'll use the warp to get there again...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Akashi
dialogue_after_selection.text:
That time was really crazy.
You suddenly got warped away...

name: Sui
text:
I was in the audience most of the time back then,
so I don't really know how big the exam venue was.
Is it that big of an event?

name: Mokdai
text:
It was on a scale large enough to build a model city.
Since they're using the same space,
it's a pretty large-scale event.

name: Akashi
text:
I know it's a big event, but
what kind of event is it exactly?
I've been so busy lately, I haven't seen the news...

Akashi scratches his cheek as he says that.
To him, Mokdai continues on with a huge smile.

name: Mokdai
text:
It's a festival held on various stars throughout the galaxy.
They're reproducing that festival on the lunar surface,
it's a festival of festivals, and its name is—

name: Mokdai
text:
The Galaxy Carnival Expo!
It's also called GCE, if I'm right.

Oh, what perfect timing!
You can leave that story to... me... no!
Leave it to us~!!

As [Player] is left unanswered,
from behind the group,
a familiar voice calls out.

name: Roudin
text:
Yo, good work.
If you wanna know about GCE,
why don't we, the organizers, give you the details?

name: Barrel
text:
As expected of us!
This is beyond good timing~!
It's practically inevitable, like fate~!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Barrel
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hey~!
It's been since I said hello to you in front of the police box the other day~, [Player]-san!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Barrel
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Whoa, my tension is already skyrocketing~!
Let's go for a hug, a hug!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Roudin
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hey, hey, it's been a while, and the first thing you talk about is my clothes?
Isn't there something else, like a reunion hug or something?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Roudin
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Well, it doesn't feel too bad to be seen as fresh.
You can enjoy it as much as you want, yes?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Barrel
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I just met Roudin-san through this job~!
It was a last-minute thing~, but...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Roudin
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Well, I'll explain that and a few more things later.
More importantly...
It's been a while, [Player].

text:
Barrel and Roudin exchange greetings.
At that point, Akashi, with a surprised
expression, also calls out.

name: Akashi
text:
R-Roudin-san!?
What the, if you were coming to Earth,
you could have contacted me...

name: Roudin
text:
Yo, Akashi. I would have liked
to call you guys while I was out sightseeing...
But I'm here for work this time.

As he says, Roudin lightly introduces
himself to the members of
Parallel Flight Inc. on the spot.

name: Roudin
text:
So, once again, an explanation of the event,
and the reason why Barrel and I are here...
We'd like to ask you for a job.

name: Crowne
text:
The GCE management is making a request to us?
If I remember correctly, Roudin-san, your affiliation is...
S&S Heroes, was it?

name: Huckle
text:
Hmm...
Roudin-san, could you please
tell us in detail?

Casually taking the third large
mug of beer from Crowne's hand,
Huckle urges him to continue.

name: Roudin
text:
Thanks, President Huckle. Well then—
The Galaxy Carnival Expo,
first, an explanation of this event.

name: Barrel
text:
Roughly speaking, Mokdai-san
called it a festival of festivals earlier,
and it's exactly that kind of event~!

name: Barrel
text:
At the Archimedes Colony,
at the site of the public hero license exam.
A huge gathering of festivals from various stars in the galaxy!!

name: Barrel
text:
Food stalls with food you can only eat on that star,
dances you can only see in videos... and much more,
it's a super exciting event packed with festivals~!

name: Roudin
text:
That's about it. At the event venue,
there are pavilions built for each festival.
Even the cityscapes are reproduced quite faithfully.

name: Mokdai
text:
Not only that, but at each pavilion,
heroes closely associated with that
festival are participating!

name: Mokdai
text:
You can meet heroes from other galaxies or
faraway stars that you can't usually meet in person,
and not just for greetings—

name: Mokdai
text:
On the main stage of the event,
there will also be an exhibition match
between the pavilions!

To Roudin and Barrel's explanation,
Mokdai also adds with a huge smile.

name: Roudin
text:
Thanks for the follow-up, Mokdai.
Now, about my agency S&S Heroes being the organizer,
to be precise, it's co-hosted with the Archimedes Colony.

name: Roudin
text:
Our company, which is strong in the travel industry,
hopped on board this event that
the colony was originally planning to do.

name: Huckle
text:
I see...
If it's a reproduction of festivals from various places,
it would be more than enough for tourism promotions.

name: Huckle
text:
But, why the request to us from there?
If your company is fully in cooperation,
it seems like it would be running smoothly...

At Huckle's words, Roudin
scratches his cheek awkwardly
and forces a smile.

name: Roudin
text:
Ah... About that.
A little while ago, we had a pre-opening
for the residents of the Archimedes Colony.

name: Roudin
text:
The event itself is lively, but
there's a pretty big difference in the number
of visitors between the pavilions.

name: Roudin
text:
Some of the pavilions... Or to be more
precise, Japan Pavilion from Earth,
is unfortunately deserted.

options.text: Could it be, that this event is also having an effect?
There was a Japan Pavilion in the first place?

name: Ryekie
text:
I knew about GCE, but
I didn't know Japan Pavilion was participating.
This is the first time I've heard of it!!

name: Mokdai
text:
Earth is all abuzz with the Summer Festa right now,
so maybe it's not being reported on much...

name: Roudin
text:
That's right... Well, in the first place.
The Japan Pavilion is a bit special,
though other stars have applied for participation—

name: Roudin
text:
Only Japan gets to participate as its host country.
By calling it the After Summer Festa,
it became more convenient for attracting tourists.

name: Huckle
text:
I see, that's quite a selection
criteria typical of your company...

name: Roudin
text:
Well, I won't try to deny it.
But, well, because of that...
It has become a bit of a problem.

As Roudin hesitates to continue,
Barrel steps in to follow up.

name: Barrel
text:
All the buzz has been taken by the Summer Festa,
so the pavilion isn't lively at all~!!

name: Barrel
text:
Other stars choose one festival and
reproduce it as is, but Japan also has
lots of festivals all over the country~.

name: Barrel
text:
And, it seems they couldn't decide which
festival to do until the very last minute~.
What they finally decided on was—

name: Barrel
text:
The elements common to all festivals throughout
the country, festival stalls and fireworks!
They decided to focus on reproducing those~!

name: Roudin
text:
But the concept was decided at the last minute,
and because we rushed the construction,
we couldn't spare any people or time for promotion.

options.text: Running an event must be tough.
The scheduling seemed a bit too optimistic?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Roudin
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Oops. You sure don't pull your punches, do you?
Well, it's a fact, but what's happened has happened.

name: Roudin
text:
So, that's why our agency, S&S Heroes,
decided to step in and help.
...And, this is where the request comes in.

name: Huckle
text:
...Hmm.
I understand the premise.
Please continue.

After confirming that Huckle in front of him nodded,
Roudin continues his explanation.

name: Roudin
text:
To liven up Japan Pavilion, we would
like to borrow the power of Parallel Flight Inc.

name: Huckle
text:
Hmm, so you'd like the heroes of
Parallel Flight to help out at
Japan Pavilion as well?

name: Roudin
text:
Well, if Zap the Justice were to appear,
it would be the best promotion we could ever get.
But what I want to request of you, is an Operator.

Laughing and shaking his head at Huckle's words,
Roudin looks straight at [Player].

name: Roudin
text:
[Player], please.
I need your help. As an Operator,
could you help out Japan Pavilion?

options.text: If it's about livening it up, wouldn't a hero be...

name: Roudin
text:
As Mokdai over there said earlier,
there are quite a few heroes participating
in each pavilion.

name: Roudin
text:
The reproduced festival, and on top of that,
a greeting with a hero!
The popular pavilions are like this.

name: Roudin
text:
The Japan Pavilion should follow suit...
Or so I'd like to say, but heroes
who are familiar with Japan are—

name: Huckle
text:
At the Summer Festa, right?
Certainly, almost all heroes on the Earth Sphere
are participating in that.

name: Roudin
text:
That's about it. Even though the periods don't overlap,
but due to it being tied down for a week right after the Summer Festa,
it's incredibly tough to make requests now.

name: Roudin
text:
I've been sending requests to agencies left and right,
and the one I finally managed to get an offer from was—

name: Barrel
text:
This officer right here~!
I was originally scheduled to
participate in GCE for security~

name: Barrel
text:
It's a large-scale event, so we got a request
for security support from the local
Archimedes Colony police~, but—

name: Barrel
text:
I may have been born in America, but I'm
completely Japanese now! I love Japanese festivals!
So, I volunteered myself~!!

name: Barrel
text:
And, when I consulted about the request,
it was decided that I would be dispatched as a hero
while also serving as plainclothes security on site~!

name: Roudin
text:
Thanks, Barrel. You're a lifesaver.
...But, we couldn't get anyone else,
so we had to send someone from our agency.

name: Roudin
text:
And that's me, and there's one more
person, but he's already at the venue.
Neither of us knows much about Japan, though.

name: Barrel
text:
Leave that to me~!
The number one festival man in Orient City,
this Barrel will teach you all you need to know~!!

name: Roudin
text:
Hehe, I'm counting on you, Barrel.
Well, it's like that,
so we've gathered the heroes, but—

name: Roudin
text:
The Operator to observe them,
I just can't find an
arrangement for that person...

name: Huckle
text:
I see...
Certainly, being tied down for a week
right after the Summer Festa is...

name: Roudin
text:
That's right...
As the organizer, our agency has dispatched
a considerable number of Operators to the pavilions.

name: Roudin
text:
If it were just transforming at the pavilion and
waving, we could manage by dividing the time,
but...

name: Mokdai
text:
Ah, could it be...
The exhibition match?

name: Roudin
text:
Yes, that's it!
On the event stage, there's an exhibition
match for the participating heroes, but—

name: Roudin
text:
An Operator needs to be present during the match,
so we just can't secure
that many personnel...

name: Roudin
text:
In terms of livening up the pavilion and promotion,
it's the perfect opportunity,
so I really want to participate, but—

options.text: So that's why you need an Operator.
This is where I come in, right!?
Work after work! I can't stand it anymore!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Roudin
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Why do you look so happy about it!?
Ah... I feel bad for you.
Your agency's working environment...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Huckle
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Could you not say things that might cause misunderstandings!?
Properly, always!
I'm always considering your schedules in mind, alright!?

name: Huckle
text:
...I see, I understand the request.
For one week during the GCE,
stationed at Japan Pavilion—

name: Huckle
text:
To observe the heroes who will be the advertisements,
and to operate the exhibition match,
is that correct?

name: Roudin
text:
I know it's a sudden and unreasonable request.
On top of that, as a member of the event management...
No, more than anything, myself personally.

As he says that, Roudin looks
straight into [Player]'s eyes and
quietly bows his head.

name: Roudin
text:
Please, [Player].
I need you to lend me your skills,
which helped liven up Aguarica, one more time.

name: Barrel
text:
I'm asking you too~!
I want everyone who comes to the event
to know the fun of festivals~!!

options.text: If you're both asking so earnestly...

name: Huckle
text:
Hmm... There's no problem with the schedule,
I've left a lot of room, so it's easy
to take a vacation after the Summer Festa.

Nodding at [Player]'s gaze,
Huckle displays the schedule on
the device in his hand.

name: Huckle
text:
There are many heroes stationed at the event venue,
and if it's on the moon, we can rush over
immediately if anything happens.

name: Huckle
text:
In terms of schedule and safety,
I have nothing more to say.
The rest, I'll leave up to you.

note: so we're spending vacation periods on work?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Huckle
dialogue_after_selection.text:
From what I've heard, it doesn't seem like such a hard schedule.
Relax, and enjoy yourself.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Ryekie
dialogue_after_selection.text:
If anything happens, be sure to contact us!!
We'll rush over immediately!!!

options.text: I'm counting on you, you two!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Barrel
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Wahha! This is the best~!
We'll call in more and more customers, and make it the most exciting~!!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Roudin
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Thanks, [Player].
If I can work with you again, it's going to be a great event.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Akashi
dialogue_after_selection.text:
No, it's still work, you know!?
Well, the fact that you're not nervous is just like you.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Mokdai
dialogue_after_selection.text:
When things calm down here, I'll come visit as a guest.
See you there!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sui
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Festivals from various stars...
Maybe I should invite Melide-chan and go.
I'll be counting on you then.

text:
At [Player]'s words,
Roudin smiles broadly and
bows his head again.

name: Roudin
text:
To be honest,
you really helped me out.

name: Roudin
text:
It's partly because I've just returned
to being a hero, but I didn't have
any other connections besides you.

name: Barrel
text:
If [Player]-san said no,
I was planning to go in front of Procy-san's
store's Link Board and just shout at people~!

name: Huckle
text:
T-That's...
In any case, we're very happy
to be of assistance.

name: Roudin
text:
I think the detailed contract information
will be sent from our legal department later.
And, well...

His relieved expression tightens again,
and Roudin turns to Huckle
and continues to speak.

name: Roudin
text:
The Parallel-Que that you prepared
for the Aguarica stage,
I'd like to request the production of that.
que? Q? cue? queue???

name: Huckle
text:
Hmm... [Player]-kun is with you,
so it's possible to use it, but
I can't make that decision on my own...

name: Crowne
text:
In that case, it looks like it's my turn.
Roudin-san, could you tell me
more about it?

With the large mug that she had
retrieved from Huckle while he was talking,
Crowne urges Roudin to continue.

name: Roudin
text:
It's the final push for the heroes' advertising effects.
The exhibition match on the main stage,
there, we heroes will—

name: Barrel
text:
Make a grand entrance in suits that
immediately identify us as Japan Pavilion!
There's no doubt it will stand out~!

name: Crowne
text:
I see, that sounds like it would be exciting.
If you can adjust the food stall shifts,
I can do one... no, two.

name: Huckle
text:
As for the shift adjustments,
I'll see what I can do.
Melide-kun and the others are working hard, too.

name: Roudin
text:
If you're short on stall staff due to the
impact of the request, let me know.
I'd be delighted to send some of our elite staff?

name: Huckle
text:
Haha, that's very encouraging.
In that case, I'll take you up on
that offer without hesitation.

name: Crowne
text:
The rest is the suit design.
When I was drinking with 'that gal' before, she said she had
plenty of time on her schedule...

She puts the empty mug down on the table,
and Crowne operates her device
to display a call screen in front of her.

name: Maculata
text:
Oh, what's wrong, Crowne?
I'm on a business trip for a while, so I told you I can't
join you for a drink, didn't I?

name: Crowne
text:
Do you think I'd only contact you
to invite you for a drink!?
...Well, you're not entirely wrong.

name: Crowne
text:
Anyway, this time it's about a request.
It's for the production of a Parallel-Que,
so can you make time in your schedule?

name: Maculata
text:
A request for a Parallel-Que?
Well, I don't think it'd be a problem,
but can you tell me more about it?

name: Maculata
text:
I see, I understand the situation.
I can make time in my schedule, but
well...

name: Roudin
text:
If there's anything I can do to help, let me know.
I know it's an unreasonable request,
so I'll do everything I can.

name: Barrel
text:
Me too~!
I'll help with anything, so
please don't hesitate to ask~!

name: Maculata
text:
Oh, what a wonderful offer, you two.
In that case, I'll take you up on it without hesitation.
And, is Sui-chan there?

At Maculata's words,
Sui approaches Crowne's device
and joins the call.

name: Sui
text:
You've worked hard, Master.
Did you request me for design support?
I'll do my best to help too...

name: Maculata
text:
Fufu, I won't be... asking for help.
This project, I'm thinking of entrusting
the entire design to you.

name: Sui
text:
Eh!?
Me, the design...?

name: Maculata
text:
The requested suit is a stage costume, right?
Sui-chan, considering your recent achievements,
you should be able to do it without any problems.

name: Maculata
text:
Of course, I'll assist you.
I'll take responsibility for the quality.
Is that alright with you, our two clients?

name: Roudin
text:
I'm an amateur when it comes to design, so.
If Maculata-san says it's not a problem,
I have nothing to say.

name: Barrel
text:
I have no problem with it at all~!
Waha, a new suit design,
I'm already excited~!!

name: Maculata
text:
Thank you for your consent.
The rest depends on your feelings, Sui-chan.
So, you want to give it a try?

name: Sui
text:
Me, designing a hero suit...
It's certainly a chance, but...

options.text: It's a rare opportunity, why not give it a try?
Go for it with an offensive mindset!!
You don't have to force yourself...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sui
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Yes... That I have the ability to be involved in a suit that protects the lives of heroes...
I can't say that so easily.
But...

name: Sui
text:
Thank you, [Player]-san.
I want to give it a try.
Master, please let me take on this request!

name: Maculata
text:
A good answer, Sui-chan.
Well then, let's get to work right away.
Please proceed to my office.

After ending the call, Sui turns to the two clients
and bows with a serious expression.

name: Sui
text:
It's as we discussed. I'll be in charge
of this request. I'll do my best,
so I look forward to working with you.

name: Sui
text:
It's a bit sudden, but would you mind
coming with me to my Master's office?
I'd like to share the image of the suit with you.

name: Barrel
text:
Roger~!
Hehe, I believed you'd accept the request,
so I've been thinking about the suit image I want~!!

name: Roudin
text:
What, Barrel, you're pretty quick on the draw.
As for me, I'm not familiar with Japanese clothing,
so please teach me whatever you can.

name: Sui
text:
Understood.
Well then, let's get going.
...Ah, President.

Just as Sui, whose eyes were sparkling at
the project in front of her, was about to start moving,
she caught sight of Huckle, who was smiling.

name: Huckle
text:
Normally, I would say that you should
have consulted with me beforehand.
But, an employee challenging a new task—

name: Huckle
text:
I don't intend to be such an unrefined boss
as to rain on such a happy moment.
Please do your best.

At Huckle's words, Sui bows
with a smile and starts
walking towards the office.

Following Sui, Barrel and Crowne also
leave the place. Seeing them off,
Roudin turns back to Huckle.

name: Roudin
text:
Thank you again, everyone of Parallel Flight Inc..
Thanks to you, I feel like I can face
the event with peace of mind.

name: Huckle
text:
No, I should be thanking you, Roudin-san.
Unexpectedly, I was able to give my employee
a good opportunity.

name: Roudin
text:
Well, I'm glad it was worth asking.
[Player] too, the event will be a long haul,
but I'm counting on you, yes?

options.text: I'll do my best, without overdoing it!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Roudin
dialogue_after_selection.text:
That's right, that's the spirit!
If you relax and take it easy, you can make a job fun.

options.text: You seem to be enjoying your work, Roudin-san.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Roudin
dialogue_after_selection.text:
What, when we met before, my motivation was...
Hehe, I can't say it was there.
But, well, that's right—

dialogue_after_selection.name: Roudin
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Now, I'm having fun.
Someone, somewhere, helped me find a dream I want to fulfill.

name: Roudin
text:
Now, then. I'll be taking my leave.
I don't want to be left behind by Sui and Barrel.
Oh, that's right—

name: Roudin
text:
If your company ever has an employee trip, come visit Tesfinito.
I'll give you the full service at our place?

name: Huckle
text:
Haha, that sounds nice.
I'll look forward to it.

name: Roudin
text:
And, [Player].
On the day, please come directly to the lunar surface,
the other hero will be on standby at the venue.

As he says, he waves his hand flutteringly,
and Roudin follows Sui and Barrel
and leaves the place.

And so, time passes since the sudden visit,
and [Player], who has spent their days at
the hugely successful Summer Festa, is—

Leaving Earth, to the lunar surface, Archimedes Colony.
At the Galaxy Carnival Expo,
they were visiting Japan Pavilion.

options.text: I was told to meet here, but...
Wow, it really is a festival!
So this is the festival of festivals...

text:
A Japanese festival reproduced on the lunar surface.
As they walk, soaking in the atmosphere,
a familiar, clear voice echoes from somewhere.

O—i!
Over here, over here—!

When [Player] turns their face
in the direction of the voice, there—

name: A Cheerful Tour Guide?
text:
Operator of Parallel Flight Inc.,
am I correct?
Amazing, you're right on time!

Waving a tour flag towards them,
a young man with a huge smile.
And what can be seen behind him is—

A handmade banner,
and written on it in large letters,
the words 'Welcome, [Player]-sama'.

name: A Cheerful Tour Guide?
text:
In Japan, this is how you
show your welcoming feelings, right?
I worked hard to make it yesterday!

name: A Cheerful Tour Guide?
text:
Well then, once again—
Welcome to the Galaxy Carnival Expo!!

name: A Cheerful Tour Guide?
text:
Together with me,
let's make this the happiest event ever!

Chapter 1:
Carnival, Carnival
